sections.heading: and divorces; void, when unlawful
sections.text: Marriages and divorces consummated on or after April 8, 1913, among such Indians, or among their descendants, according to Indian custom, are hereby declared to be unlawful and shall be punished as hereinafter provided.SourceLaws 1913, c. 68, § 3, p. 202;R.S.1913, §

42-403.Marriages and divorces; void, when unlawful.

Marriages and divorces consummated on or after April 8, 1913, among such Indians, or among their descendants, according to Indian custom, are hereby declared to be unlawful and shall be punished as hereinafter provided.

SourceLaws 1913, c. 68, § 3, p. 202;R.S.1913, § 1609;C.S.1922, § 1558;C.S.1929, § 42-403;R.S.1943, § 42-403.
